meanings.definition: To an extremely large or great degree
meanings.sent1: She was astronomically excited about her birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The price of the house was astronomically high.
meanings.sent3: The amount of ice cream he ate was astronomically large!
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals was astronomically deep.
meanings.sent5: The mountain was astronomically tall, reaching up to the sky.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to astronomy or the study of celestial objects
meanings.sent1: She gazed astronomically at the stars in wonder.
meanings.sent2: The telescope allowed him to see the planets astronomically.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat astronomically on the windowsill, pretending to be a moon.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of constellations was astronomically impressive.
meanings.sent5: The sky was astronomically clear, revealing countless stars.
